attributes.action: Deploy ALL Royal Navy, Army and Royal Air Force to all brittish mainland borders
attributes.additional_details:
We believe that a silent and peacefull flooding of people on our mainland is currently under way.
The nation is flooding with people.
We are currently above capacity of what the nation can support as seen by our import and export figures.
We would have to spend more on imports to support these people.
We want to focus all the government and kings capacity to help bring the uk to a sustainable country once again.
We do not have enough houses or money for our own nationals to keep afloat.
attributes.background: We would like the king to use his reserved powers and power as the head of the armed forces to deploy the Navy, Army and Air Force to all mainland borders, in order to protect our shores from any crossings by sea and air that have not had prior authorisation.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/701998
